text: Pakati pevanhu veGwaro (maJudha nemaKristu) pane uyo, ukamuchengetesa Qintaar (hupfumi hwakawandisa), anohudzosera kwauri; uye pakati pavo pane uyo, ukamuchengetesa Diinaar (Ndarama 4.25g) haaidzoseri kwauri kunze kwekuti wamira-mira uchisheedzera, nekuti vanoti: “Hapana chakaipa patiri nekutora midziyo yevasina ruzivo (maArabhu).” Asi vanotaura manyepo pamusoro paAllah vachiziva
